text: Thalia Theatre and Thalia Theater may refer to: * Bowery Theatre, New York City, commonly called the Thalia Theatre * Thalia Spanish Theatre, Queens, NY * Symphony Space, New York City, includes Leonard Nimoy Thalia, formerly Thalia Theater * Thalia Theater (Berlin), Berlin, Germany * Thalia Theater (Graz), Graz, Austria * Thalia Theater (Hamburg), Hamburg, Germany * Thalias Kompagnons, a puppet theatre in Nuremberg, Germany ==See also== * Thalia (disambiguation), for further disambiguation * Thalia (muse), the muse of comedy, for whom the above theaters are named
title: Thalia Theatre
